item.title: 西门子的 Busch 着眼于运营软件、人工智能和生命科学领域的 M&A
item.description: 西门子股份公司首席执行官罗兰-布施（Roland Busch）认为，人工智能、生命科学和运营软件（管理工厂的软件）领域存在交易潜力。【原文：Siemens AG Chief Executive Officer Roland Busch sees potential deals in artificial intelligence, life sciences and operations software, which runs factories.】

item.title: KBC 和 Van Lanschot Kempen 将组建股票合资企业
item.description: KBC 证券公司和 Van Lanschot Kempen 投资银行同意将其股票业务合并为一家平等的合资企业，以扩大股票覆盖面，增强在各自市场的影响力。【原文：KBC Securities and Van Lanschot Kempen Investment Banking agreed to combine their equities businesses into an equal joint venture as they seek to broaden stock coverage and increase heft in their markets.】

item.title: 瑞银称甲骨文债务 "不太可能 "触发评级下调至垃圾级
item.description: 据瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，尽管甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）为扩大其人工智能推进计划而借款数百亿美元，但该公司在短期内可能会维持其投资级债券评级。【原文：Oracle Corp. will likely maintain its investment-grade bond rating in the near term despite borrowing tens of billions of dollars to expand its artificial-intelligence push, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 丰业银行首席执行官认为 "特朗普主义 "有利于增长
item.description: 丰业银行首席执行官斯科特-汤姆森（Scott Thomson）表示，拉美地区的政治右倾化以及美国在该地区影响力的上升将使丰业银行的国际业务受益。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia’s international business could benefit from a rightward political shift in Latin America alongside rising US influence in the region, Chief Executive Officer Scott Thomson said.】

item.title: 债券交易员在期货市场押下有史以来最大一笔美联储基金赌注
item.description: 周二，就在一系列可能影响美国利率预期的关键美国劳动力数据公布前几天，美联储基金期货市场出现了创纪录规模的大宗交易。【原文：A record-sized block trade was placed in the fed funds futures market Tuesday, just days ahead of a key set of US labor data that could shape US interest-rate expectations.】

item.title: 康卡斯特旗下 NBC 出售冬奥会广告库存
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）旗下的 NBC 环球公司（NBCUniversal）在即将到来的冬奥会上已经没有剩余的广告位，这表明在该公司为下个月包括超级碗（Super Bowl LX）和 NBA 全明星赛（NBA All-Star Game）在内的一系列体育赛事做准备时，对广告位的需求量很大。【原文：Comcast Corp.’s NBCUniversal has no remaining ad spots available for the upcoming Winter Olympics, signaling high demand as the company prepares for a whirlwind of sporting events next month including Super Bowl LX and the NBA All-Star Game.】

item.title: iPhone Air 背后的苹果设计师加入人工智能初创公司 Hark
item.description: 帮助设计 iPhone Air 的前苹果公司设计师正在加入人工智能初创公司 Hark，这也是该公司吸引硅谷人才的举措之一。【原文：The former Apple Inc. designer who helped create the iPhone Air is joining AI startup Hark, part of a push by that company to attract Silicon Valley talent.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉不断减少的石油储量威胁石油生产
item.description: 据海事情报公司 Kpler Ltd.称，随着储油罐接近满负荷，许多船只为躲避美国海军封锁而避开加勒比海水域，委内瑞拉的石油产量有可能在几周内严重下降。【原文：Venezuelan oil production is at risk of severe decline within weeks as storage tanks approach full capacity and many ships steer clear of Caribbean waters to avoid a US naval blockade, according to maritime intelligence firm Kpler Ltd.】

item.title: 150 亿美元顾问称急于投资委内瑞拉是 "疯狂 "行为
item.description: CV Advisors 首席执行官表示，尼古拉斯-马杜罗下台后，投资委内瑞拉的热情突然高涨是 "荒谬的"，在恢复民主和法治之前，不会出现任何有意义的机会。【原文：The sudden rush of interest to invest in Venezuela after the removal of Nicolas Maduro is “ridiculous” and no meaningful opportunities will arise until the restoration of democracy and rule of law, according to the chief executive officer of CV Advisors.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 公司首席执行官称委内瑞拉局势变化对炼油企业有利
item.description: 美国最大的炼油商之一认为，委内瑞拉石油工业的潜在重新开放将极大地促进依赖重质原油的燃料制造商的发展。【原文：One of the largest US oil refiners sees a potential reopening of Venezuela’s oil industry as a major boost to fuel-makers that rely on heavier crude grades.】

item.title: 太空、人工智能和加密货币候选企业引领今年美国 IPO 看点
item.description: 美国首次公开募股市场正准备迎接一轮交易热潮，其规模可能会赶上甚至超过大流行病时期的记录，其中包括科技、金融和加密货币领域最受关注的一些私营公司，而且可能是有史以来规模最大的一次上市。【原文：The US initial public offering market is bracing for a rush of deals that could rival or even top the pandemic-era record, with a lineup including some of the most closely watched private companies in technology, finance and crypto – and potentially the biggest listing of all time.】

item.title: 阿根廷财政部在支付关键债务前几天买入美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，阿根廷财政部正在购买进入当地市场的水电站私有化所产生的美元，在本周到期的关键债券支付之前积累绿钞。【原文：Argentina’s Treasury is buying dollars entering the local market from the privatization of hydroelectric power plants, amassing greenbacks ahead of a key payment on its bonds due this week, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 首席执行官指出计算需求飙升 AMD 股价仍下滑
item.description: 高级微器件公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. shares slid on Tuesday, with investors brushing off comments by Chief Executive Officer Lisa Su that demand is soaring.】

item.title: 巴西摆脱特朗普关税影响，2025 年出口创历史新高
item.description: 由于扩大了对中国和其他主要贸易伙伴的出口，巴西的出口在 2025 年飙升至创纪录的水平，摆脱了美国数月来惩罚性关税的影响。【原文：Brazilian exports surged to record levels in 2025, shrugging off months of punishing US tariffs thanks to expanded shipments to China and other major trading partners.】

item.title: 法国寻求对化肥免征欧盟碳边境税
item.description: 法国农业部官员表示，法国将寻求免除欧盟今年对化肥征收的碳边境税，此举旨在减轻陷入困境的农民的成本。【原文：France will seek an exemption for fertilizers from carbon border levies imposed this year by the European Union, in a move aimed at easing costs on struggling farmers, according to agriculture ministry officials.】

item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 加拿大汽车销量回升至大流行前水平
item.description: 据 DesRosiers 汽车咨询公司估计，尽管与美国的贸易中断造成了动荡，但加拿大去年的轻型汽车销量仍达到了 2019 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Light vehicle sales in Canada last year reached their highest level since 2019 despite the turmoil caused by trade disruptions with the US, according to estimates from DesRosiers Automotive Consultants Inc.】

item.title: Nvidia首席执行官的讲话推动Sandisk上涨1000
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在科技大会 CES 上发表评论，强调内存和存储的需求之后，Sandisk 公司股价周二大涨 25%，创下 2 月份以来的最佳盘中表现纪录。首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在科技大会 CES 上发表评论，强调了对内存和存储的需求。【原文：Sandisk Corp. shares jumped as much as 25% Tuesday, hitting a record in their best intraday performance since February, after Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang highlighted the need for memory and storage in comments at the tech conference CES.】

item.title: Citadel 证券公司称 "一月效应 "有望推动美股反弹
item.description: 据 Citadel Securities 公司称，随着早期资本流动和市场涨势的扩大，今年 "一月效应 "的承诺看起来非常真实，为整个美国股市的上涨奠定了基础。【原文：The promise of the “January effect” looks all too real this year as early capital flows and a broadening of the market rally set the stage for gains across US equities, according to Citadel Securities.】

item.title: 威德福首席执行官称委内瑞拉是石油行业的 "巨大机遇
item.description: 世界上最大的石油服务供应商之一威德福国际公司称，在美国抓获加勒比海国家领导人尼古拉斯-马杜罗之后，委内瑞拉为该行业带来了 "巨大的机遇"。【原文：Weatherford International Plc, one of the world’s biggest oil service providers, called Venezuela a “massive opportunity” for the industry following the US capture of the Caribbean nation’s leader, Nicolás Maduro.】

item.title: 收购公司 Hg 将以 64 亿美元的交易价格将 OneStream 私有化
item.description: 收购公司 Hg 已同意收购 OneStream Inc.【原文：Buyout firm Hg has agreed to acquire OneStream Inc. in a deal valuing the financial software maker at an equity value of about $6.4 billion.】

item.title: 芝加哥最大电力公司签署协议，防止数据中心增加能源支出
item.description: 芝加哥最大的电力公司联邦爱迪生公司（Commonwealth Edison Co.【原文：Chicago’s biggest electricity company, Commonwealth Edison Co., is taking steps to prevent the data center boom backing the rise of artificial intelligence from raising energy bills for consumers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯精炼燃料流量因柴油激增而创下四个月新高
item.description: 由于从波罗的海港口运往附近市场的柴油量增加，俄罗斯石油产品出口量在 12 月份上升到四个月来的最高点。【原文：Russian oil product exports rose in December to a four-month high, driven by stronger diesel shipments from ports in the Baltic Sea to nearby markets.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉黑暗舰队消失，雪佛龙公司 11 艘船整装待发
item.description: 美国军队推翻尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）总统后，雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）预订的一支小型舰队正驶往委内瑞拉，成为该国唯一的石油出口商。【原文：A small armada of ships booked by Chevron Corp. is sailing to Venezuela as the company emerges as the only exporter of the country’s oil following the ouster of President Nicolas Maduro by US forces.】

item.title: 机器人真空吸尘器制造商 Roborock 展示带腿爬楼梯模型
item.description: 中国机器人吸尘器品牌Roborock发布了一款概念设备，它有两条腿，可以在人们家中爬楼梯，这是向普通消费者推销家用机器人概念的一个华而不实的例子。【原文：Roborock, a Chinese robotic vacuum cleaner brand, unveiled a concept device with two legs that can climb stairs in people’s homes, a flashy example of efforts to sell ordinary consumers on the idea of home robots.】

item.title: 普尔特瞄准信用定价，Equifax 和 TransUnion 股价下跌
item.description: 在联邦住房金融局局长比尔-普尔特（Bill Pulte）指责美国最大的信用报告公司提高价格之后，这些公司的股价受到重挫。【原文：Shares of America’s largest credit-reporting companies are getting pummeled after Federal Housing Finance Agency Director Bill Pulte called out the firms for raising prices.】

item.title: 捷克政府在预算缺口达到 140 亿美元后寻求节约
item.description: 捷克共和国的预算赤字超过了 2025 年的目标，使得新政府不得不为其优先事项寻找节余和资金。【原文：The Czech Republic’s budget deficit exceeded the target for 2025, leaving the new government scrambling to find savings and financing for its priorities.】

item.title: 英伟达首席财务官称营收预测更加乐观
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席财务官科莱特-克雷斯（Colette Kress）说，由于需求强劲，这家芯片制造商在 10 月份给出的收入预测变得更加乐观。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Financial Officer Colette Kress said a bullish revenue forecast that the chipmaker gave in October has only gotten brighter due to strong demand.】

item.title: 高盛警告美国电网到 2030 年将面临电力紧张问题
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Almost all US power grids will lack critical spare capacity by 2030 as demand surges to supply data centers, with bottlenecks threatening to hand China an edge in the artificial-intelligence boom, according to an analyst at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 如果没有 2026 年预算，法国政府预计赤字率将接近 5.4
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，由于议会未能在去年年底前通过预算法案，2026 年的财政赤字可能超过经济产出的 5.4%。【原文：French Finance Minister Roland Lescure said the 2026 deficit could exceed 5.4% of economic output after parliament failed to adopt a budget bill before the end of last year.】
